channel.title: CMake on encelo.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in CMake on encelo.github.io

item.title: nCine Dev Update 10
item.description:
I’m sure many of you have heard it already: the nCine source code has been released on GitHub!

This means that lately most of the time was dedicated to publication related tasks, for example updates to the site like the addition of a “why nCine?” page and a gallery.

item.title: nCine Dev Update 8
item.description: I have spent some very intense weeks this March to completely overhaul and refactor my CMake scripts. We are talking about more than two thousand lines of code! 😱
